resources.string: This is a custom message box
Recorder is busy or permission to record is prohibited
0dB : Most people just hear a low noise.
50dB and more: affects rest and sleep.
70dB and more: can affect learning and work.
150dB : A sudden exposure to a sound environment of 150dB, will break the eardrums. The audition will be completely lost.
